reviews.review: Cracking toast Gromit. Amazing game, I have never played anything slightly similar. Innovative, funny and hard to crack.

This game is wonderful. I have always and will forever love the story. If you haven't played the first game, I recommend you play it before this one. The co-op mode is also very entertaining and I had a lot of fun with my friend. Overall 11/10 game.

I love this game so much. 
Originally saw jacksepticeye play both of them and a few years later decided to finally play them for myself. i will admit that i had to look up a few walk throughs on various levels but other than that most of them weren't too hard/weren't too easy (except the ones that were supposed to be of course) 
if you're thinking of getting it, do it. You wont regret it.
It's Portal 2.  You're going to find displayed in a museum in 100 years as an example of 'the good stuff'.  Play it.

This game is a puzzle game wrapped around an excellent adventure. This game might seem short to pro gamers, consisting of 10 or so hours, give or take a few. However with the co-op mode and hundreds and thousands of custom maps, it's easy to get at least 30 hours or so of game play (if you have friends that is) overall this game is a great game for anyone, well worth the money. 8/10
its not a bad game just a confusing one requires really big brain or dont be an idiot like me
ruined at least 3 friendships, was expecting more

scary robot lady says you are a monster 10/10

I remember encountering this game back in 2012 when I was around 10 years old. And now after 10 years have passed, I had the honor of finally playing it. It was everything I expected and so much more. I now understand the depth behind the iconic characters and facility I met ten years ago; needless to say, I had a great time playing. :)
